txt.en:
The grizzled, old healer squints at you. After a brief pause, he nods in approval.

'I can see that you're no stranger to war. Might need your help. The Angmarim at Dûn Traikh administered poison to their prisoners, like Einar here. Can't craft an antidote 'til I get a hold of the poison itself.

'Head west to Dûn Traikh. A few Angmarim there may be carrying phials of the poison.'
Some of the scouts have been poisoned by the Angmarim and require an antidote.
You have found several phials of the Angmarims' poison.\n\nYou should deliver the phials to Thrúthug at Drenghól so that he can create an antidote.
'Still breathin', I see. That's good. Wouldn't want another person that needs tending on my watch.\n\n'I'll get these scouts back up on their feet soon enough.'
Dûn Traikh is located west of Drenghól.\n\nYou may find phials of the poison by defeating Angmarim there.
